result.title: SciShops digital twinning services
result.description: The core feature for end user interaction is integrated into the portal, running and validated. Enabling efficient connection of stakeholders to each other is essential for the sustainable engagement of hosts and participants at regional, national and international level. The twinning service therefore will provide multiple parameters to be set by the end users in order to refine twinning requests and to optimize service output.

result.title: Report on the integration of best practices, strategies and innovative solutions to dairy sustainability
result.description: In each regional context, an optimal combination of science and practice based innovations will need to be found which increases synergistic effects and reduces tradeoffs. Based on the inventories described at deliverable 7.1 region-specific packages of science and practice based innovations will be constructed characterized by the highest possible economic, environmental and social performance. A framework will be developed and reported to allow better integration of measures at farm level.

project.title: A Europe-wide thematic network supporting a sustainable future for EU dairy farmers

result.title: Sustainability Plan for 4D4F website & CoP
result.description: Sustainability plan, delivered in month 30, will set out how the Community of Practice will be maintained after the project finishes.
